prop.name: benefits
prop.desc: Description of benefits associated with the job.

prop.name: qualifications
prop.desc: Specific qualifications required for this role.

prop.name: incentiveCompensation
prop.desc: Description of bonus and commission compensation aspects of the job.

prop.name: workHours
prop.desc: The typical working hours for this job (e.g. 1st shift, night shift, 8am-5pm).

prop.name: salaryCurrency
prop.desc: The currency (coded using ISO 4217 ) used for the main salary information in this job posting or for this employee.

prop.name: jobBenefits
prop.desc: Description of benefits associated with the job.

prop.name: datePosted
prop.desc: Publication date for the job posting.

prop.name: skills
prop.desc: Skills required to fulfill this role.

prop.name: incentives
prop.desc: Description of bonus and commission compensation aspects of the job.

prop.name: educationRequirements
prop.desc: Educational background needed for the position.

prop.name: responsibilities
prop.desc: Responsibilities associated with this role.

prop.name: baseSalary
prop.desc: The base salary of the job or of an employee in an EmployeeRole.

prop.name: validThrough
prop.desc: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.

prop.name: hiringOrganization
prop.desc: Organization offering the job position.

prop.name: specialCommitments
prop.desc: Any special commitments associated with this job posting. Valid entries include VeteranCommit, MilitarySpouseCommit, etc.

prop.name: occupationalCategory
prop.desc: Category or categories describing the job. Use BLS O*NET-SOC taxonomy: http://www.onetcenter.org/taxonomy.html. Ideally includes textual label and formal code, with the property repeated for each applicable value.

prop.name: experienceRequirements
prop.desc: Description of skills and experience needed for the position.

prop.name: employmentType
prop.desc: Type of employment (e.g. full-time, part-time, contract, temporary, seasonal, internship).

prop.name: jobLocation
prop.desc: A (typically single) geographic location associated with the job position.

prop.name: title
prop.desc: The title of the job.

prop.name: industry
prop.desc: The industry associated with the job position.
